mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, chboard.* from chBoard join ChannelList on chBoard.chNum = ChannelList.chNum order by boardNum desc) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from (select * from ChannelList order by chVisit desc) where rownum <= 9
select * from (select * from ChannelList where cate_ID = #{categoryNum} order by chVisit desc) where rownum <= 9
select * from (select * from chBoard order by (boardHeart + boardVisit) desc) where rownum <= 7
select chboard.*, chboardcategory.chcate_name from chboard join chboardcategory on chboard.chnum = chboardcategory.chnum where boardnum = #{boardNum} and chboard.chcate_id = chboardcategory.chcate_id
SELECT * FROM chboard WHERE boardTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR boardContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
